hero.tagline: A New Standard in Dental Care
hero.description: Experience exceptional dental care in a modern, comfortable environment. Our expert team is dedicated to providing you with the highest quality service.

welcome.title: Why Trust Paradise Dental?
welcome.col1_desc: Cared for by Dr. Phinyada and our expert team. Precise facial structure analysis.
welcome.col2_desc: Erase old fears. CafÃ©-style clinic design. Clean, safe, comfortable every visit.
welcome.col3_desc: Price quoted before treatment. Social security accepted. Payment plans available for orthodontics.
welcome.p1: At Paradise Dental, we believe that a healthy smile is the gateway to a happier life. Our mission is to provide exceptional dental care in a comfortable, friendly, and modern environment where your well-being comes first.
welcome.p2: We combine cutting-edge dental technology with compassionate, personalized care to ensure every patient feels valued. Whether you are visiting for a routine checkup or a complex procedure, our team is here to support you every step of the way.
welcome.p3: Serving our community with professional dental services in both Thai and English, we are committed to making quality dental care accessible to everyone.

hero.description: Dedicated to providing exceptional dental care in a comfortable, friendly, and modern environment since 2010.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: At Paradise Dental Clinic, our mission is to provide exceptional dental care in a comfortable, friendly, and modern environment. We believe that a healthy smile is a gateway to a happier life.
mission.p2: We are committed to staying at the forefront of dental innovation while maintaining the personal touch that makes our patients feel like family.
mission.p3: Serving our community in both Thai and English, we strive to make quality dental care accessible and comfortable for everyone.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our care every day

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: We pursue the highest standards in dental care, continuously updating our skills and technology.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.desc: Our caring team creates a warm, supportive environment where your comfort comes first.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We embrace modern dental technology to deliver safer, faster, and more comfortable treatments.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.desc: We build trust through honest communication, transparent pricing, and ethical practices.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Expert professionals dedicated to your smile

member1.name: Dr. Somchai Prasert
member1.bio: Specialize in smile makeovers and implant dentistry with over 15 years of experience.

member2.name: Dr. Emily Chen
member2.bio: Brings artistic vision to dental aesthetics, helping patients achieve their dream smiles.

member3.name: Kannika Saetang
member3.bio: Specializes in preventive care and patient education with a gentle, comforting touch.

member4.name: David Thompson
member4.bio: Dedicated to creating perfectly aligned smiles with traditional braces and clear aligners.

hero.description: Comprehensive, world-class dental care tailored to your unique needs using the latest technology.

services.title: Complete Smile Care Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive dental care for your beautiful smile

general.title: General Dentistry & Treatment
general.desc: Scaling / Filling / Root Canal / Wisdom Tooth Extraction

ortho.title: Orthodontics
ortho.desc: Metal Braces / Clear Aligners (Invisalign) / Jaw Correction

implants.title: Dental Implants
implants.desc: Replace missing teeth with durable, natural-looking dental implants.

root_canal.title: Root Canal Therapy
root_canal.desc: Save infected or damaged teeth with gentle, effective endodontic treatment.

periodontics.title: Periodontics
periodontics.desc: Treat and prevent gum disease with specialized periodontal care.

oral_surgery.title: Oral Surgery
oral_surgery.desc: Expert surgical care for tooth extractions, wisdom teeth removal, and other procedures.

pediatric.title: Pediatric Dentistry
pediatric.desc: Gentle, fun dental care designed specifically for children.

pricing.title: Start Your Dental Care Today... Choose Your Package
pricing.subtitle: Online booking system - convenient, no waiting required!

review1.name: Somying K.
review1.text: Very gentle dentist, no pain at all. Clean clinic, great atmosphere, lovely staff. Highly recommend!

review2.name: Wittaya S.
review2.text: Beautiful modern clinic with complete equipment. Doctor gave excellent consultation and clear explanations.

review3.name: Napassorn P.
review3.text: Teeth really got whiter, clear results. Affordable price, great value. Excellent service.

review4.name: Prasert W.
review4.text: Kind doctor who explains every step. Not rushed, detailed work. Very impressed.

review5.name: Sudarat M.
review5.text: Excellent service, no waiting. Clean, friendly. Already recommended to many friends.

hero.description: We're here to help. Reach out to us for appointments, inquiries, or any questions about our dental services.

contact.parking_desc: Free parking available in building basement. Entrance on Soi 15.
contact.cta_subtitle: Schedule your visit today and experience premium dental care.

footer.about_description: Paradise Dental Clinic provides comprehensive dental care with experienced specialists and modern technology, dedicated to your beautiful smile and healthy teeth.
footer.address: 63/1-2 Soi 4, Tesaban 3 Rd., Thang Kwian, Klaeng, Rayong
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 Paradise Dental Clinic. All rights reserved.
